mapper.select:
SELECT ROWNUM AS rm, A.group_code, B.manage_no, B.purchs_date, B.purchs_amount, C.name, E.pern_no , E.use_yn, B.use_place, B.disuse_yn
FROM cmmn_code_manage A, eqpmn_manage B, hpa100t C, eqpmn_user_mapping D, eqpmn_use_manage E
WHERE A.code = B.eqpmn_code AND B.manage_no = D.manage_no AND D.pern_no = E.pern_no AND E.pern_no = C.pern_no
